AGENT_MGMT.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Agents

An agent is a member of your team who can answer customer conversations.

You can manage your existing agents from this page or invite new members using the

button. Upon being invited, they will receive a confirmation email with a link to activate their account and start saving the day, one customer at a time.

In Chatwoot, there are two types of roles:

Agent : This role provides access to inboxes, reports, and conversations. Agents can assign and resolve conversations as well.

Administrator : This role provides full access to all Chatwoot features and settings, in addition to agent privileges. Administrators have complete control over the account.

Open the Agents handbook in another tab for a helping hand.
